Flash memory¶

Organization of flash memory for keypad lock use¶

kp_err kp_flash_init()¶

sk_refresh() - erase all sectors used by keypad.

Return: sk_err.

kp_err kp_write_settings_to_flash(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_write_settings_to_flash() - write settings to flash memory. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Pack keypad settings and add note about them in the firsh empty space in settings_sector in flash memory.

Return: kp_err.

kp_err kp_read_settings_from_flash(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_read_settings_from_flash() - read settings from flash memory. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Read recent note about settings from settings_sector in flash memory and unpack it to keypad.

Return: kp_err.

kp_err kp_write_logs_to_flash(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_write_logs_to_flash() - write log about attemp to unlock keypad to flash memory. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Pack keypad log and add note about them in the firsh empty space in fail_log_sector in flash memory.

Return: kp_err.

kp_err kp_read_logs_from_flash(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_read_logs_from_flash() - read settings from flash memory. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Read recent note about log from fail_log_sector in flash memory and unpack it to keypad.

Return: kp_err.

int kp_if_failed_logs()¶

kp_if_failed_logs() - check recent fail log.

Return: bool. Return true if log about recent failed attempt to unlock keypad metters, else - return false.

int kp_if_failed_logs_np()¶

kp_if_failed_logs_np() - check recent fail log.

Return: bool. Return true if keypad has not react on failed attempt to unlock keypad yet, else - return false.

void kp_logs_in_flash_successed()¶

kp_logs_in_flash_successed() - mark recent log as successful attempt.

Return: void.

void kp_logs_in_flash_failed()¶

kp_logs_in_flash_failed() - mark recent log as failed attempt.

Return: void.

void kp_logs_in_flash_failed_p()¶

kp_logs_in_flash_failed() - mark recent log as failed attempt that was ‘punished’.

Return: void.

Pack keypad lock data¶

void pack_fail_log(uint8_t *buffer, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

pack_fail_log() - pack data about failed attempts to unlock keypad. @uint8_t *buffer: pointer on buffer with size GLOBAL_DATA_SIZE. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Pack data about keypad to uint8_t buffer of FAIL_LOG_SIZE size.

Return: void.

void unpack_fail_log(uint8_t *buffer, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

unpack_fail_log() - unpack data about failed attempts to unlock keypad. @uint8_t *buffer: pointer on buffer with size GLOBAL_DATA_SIZE. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Unpack data about keypad from uint8_t buffer of FAIL_LOG_SIZE size.

Return: void.

void pack_settings(uint8_t *buffer, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

pack_settings() - pack keypad settings. @uint8_t *buffer: pointer on buffer with size GLOBAL_DATA_SIZE. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Pack data about keypad to uint8_t buffer of SETTINGS_SIZE size.

Return: void.

void unpack_settings(uint8_t *buffer, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

unpack_settings() - unpack keypad settings. @uint8_t *buffer: pointer on buffer with size GLOBAL_DATA_SIZE. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Unpack data about keypad from uint8_t buffer of SETTINGS_SIZE size.

Return: void.
